oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Limit Password Reuse
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The passwords to remember should be set correctly.

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check if pam_pwhistory.so or pam_unix.so are configured
Check if pam_pwhistory.so is properly configured

oval-def:criterion.comment: pam_pwhistory.so is properly defined in password section of PAM file

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check the expected value for pam_pwhistory.so remember parameter
Check the pam_pwhistory.so remember parameter is only in PAM file

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check the remember parameter in password section of PAM file
Check the pam_pwhistory.so remember parameter is absent in pwhistory.conf

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check the pam_pwhistory.so remember parameter is only in pwhistory.conf file

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check the pam_pwhistory.so remember parameter is absent in PAM file
Check the remember parameter in /etc/security/pwhistory.conf
Remember parameter of pam_unix.so is properly configured

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Configure the root Account for Failed Password Attempts
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The root account should be configured to deny access after the number of defined failed attempts has been reached.

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check the proper configuration of pam_faillock.so
Check if pam_faillock.so is properly enabled
Count occurrences of pam_unix.so in system-auth and password-auth

oval-def:criterion.comment: pam_unix.so appears only once in auth section of system-auth
pam_unix.so appears only once in auth section of password-auth

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check common definition of pam_faillock.so

oval-def:criterion.comment: pam_faillock.so is properly defined in auth section of system-auth
pam_faillock.so is properly defined in account section of system-auth
pam_faillock.so is properly defined in auth section of password-auth
pam_faillock.so is properly defined in account section of password-auth

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check expected value for pam_faillock.so even_deny_root parameter

Check the even_deny_root parameter in auth section of password-auth file
Ensure /etc/security/faillock.conf is not used together with pam files

oval-def:criteria.comment: Check expected pam_faillock.so even_deny_root parameter in faillock.conf

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check the even_deny_root parameter is not present system-auth file
Check the even_deny_root parameter is not present password-auth file
Ensure the even_deny_root parameter is present in /etc/security/faillock.conf
TMOUT value in /etc/profile <= var_accounts_tmout
TMOUT value in /etc/profile.d/*.sh <= var_accounts_tmout
At least one config file has TMOUT defined
